I'm using Heritrix for crawling, right now we're writing our data to a 
Riak cluster and we're looking into running multiple crawlers. I've 
found some documentation regarding the Heritrix Cluster Controller, but 
this looks like it only works with Heritrix 1.x. Is that the case?

If it is, does anyone know of a project working on coordinating multiple 
crawlers? This is work I'm prepared to do but I don't want to reinvent 
the wheel.
